channel.title: Birthed by the Necrophage
channel.description: Recent content on Birthed by the Necrophage

item.title: Session 502: The Two Towers
item.description:
Session date: 12/28/2019, Dave’s house

Previously On

The party is taking a break from dungeon crawling Tobart Tower.

item.title: Session 501: Tower Assault III
item.description:
Session date: 10/19/2019, Joel’s house

Previously On

The party has been deeded Tobart Tower as payment for services rendered to Jon Tobart (a recently deceased space beholder.)

item.title: Session 406: Flynn Island
item.description:
Session date: 09/28/2019, Toby’s house

Previously On

Jon Tobart is defeated, and Flynn just used the astroid to destroy the beholder fleet.

item.title: Session 405: The Central Chamber
item.description:
Session date: 08/03/2019, Kevin’s house

Previously On

The party has finally made its way to the interior of the asteroid, and is exploring a tunnel system that connects to the astroid’s obelisks and a series of giant, oddly-shaped rooms with weird stuff going on inside.

item.title: Session 404: The Queen's Eyes
item.description:
Session date: 06/29/2019, Dave’s house

Previously On

The party has “evicted” the occupants and taken possession the Defiance, a wrecked spelljammer with a shattered spelljamming helm.

An end and a beginning.

item.title: S03E05: Minzoan Microaggressions, part 3

Session date: 07/28/2018, Dave’s house

A goal is achieved.

item.title: S03E04: Minzoan Microaggressions, part 2
item.description:
Session date: 06/02/2018, Joel’s house

The party travels across Minzoa and makes a new friend.

item.title: S03E03: Minzoan Microaggressions, part 1
item.description:
Session date: 05/05/2018, Kevin’s house

The party arrives in Minzoa and fights some monsters.

item.title: S03E02: Tower Assault II
item.description:
Session date: 03/17/2018, Toby’s house

The Party infiltrates a tower and ends up in a petri dish.

item.title: S03E01: City of Thieves
item.description:
Session date: 02/17/2017, Dave’s house

In which the Party arrives in Quodeth on their loot-laden galley with three goals: sell stuff, buy stuff, and release a chaos god.

item.title: S02E09: Epilogue
item.description:
Session date 12/29/2017

Sub-Colonel Zogg has been defeated, the Eld are organizing a mass evacuation, and the island is quickly reverting to it’s natural jungle conditions. The party cancels its plans for further looting, and decides to pack up and head out to fresh adventuring environs. But pack up and head out in what? The party’s bubble car is no longer parked on the landing platform where they left it.

item.title: S02E08: Kill Sub-Colonel Zogg, part 2
item.description:
S02E08: Kill Sub-Colonel Zogg, part 2

Session date 11/11/2017

If you recall, the party begins this session in a holed up safely their force-dome hut, occupying and blocking both entrances to a prominent antechamber in the middle of the Eld command bunker.

item.title: S02E07: Kill Sub-Colonel Zogg, part 1
item.description:
Session date 10/07/2017

Some stuff that happened:

item.title: S02E06: Exposition of the Carnifex
item.description:
Session Date: 09/16/2017

The party begins this session in the elevator on the way to the Fourth Floor… but decides instead to head down to the first and second floors to make sure the building is fully secured. It isn’t, and some more Eld techs are killed.

item.title: S02E05: The Further Adventures of Bubbly the Bubble Car
item.description:
Session Date: 08/05/2017

This session begins on the north shore of what is conclusively revealed to be an island, and ends back in the Corpselvator, ascending to the mysterious Fourth Floor. Along the way some stuff happens, including:

item.title: S02E04: The Corpselvator
item.description:
Session Date: 7/15/2017

The party continues to explore the mysterious floating Eld structure (Area 3,) and —whenever the DM manages to remember it— continue to be intermittently interrupted by overwhelming screams of pain and anguish. Maybe they’ll eventually to get to the top of the building and find out who’s making all the noise?

item.title: S02E03: The Tortured God's Wail
item.description:
Session Date: 6/4/2017

The party scrambles to learn the basics of bubble car operation, fleeing the scene of Session 11’s near-TPK and heading northwest into the mists (off the shore of Area 15.)

item.title: Campaign Goals
item.description: Stuff (besides killing monsters) that will earn XP. The entire party earns XP when a goal is achieved, even if the goal is linked to a specific character. Achieved! Session 501: Learn a new scent (Marvus) Session 403: Obtain a spelljamming helm Session 308: Free the Carnifex from her prison beneath Quodeth S03E06: Retrieve 15,000 gp from Itrep for Fat Julie S03E06: Retrieve the pipes of Minzoa from Itrep’s tower for Faisal S03E06: Retrieve a crystal plate from Itrep’s tower for Michalena S03E06: Retrieve the Minzoa Sextant Minzoa from Itrep’s tower for Osgood S03E05: Find Irtep and get him to reveal the Carnifex’s location S03E05: Use Gynnen’s scroll to cure Irtep S03E01: Invent new occult technology (Flynn) S03E01: Return to civilization with as much loot as possible S02E09: Intimidate someone into aiding the party (Marvus) S02E08: Free the area from Eld control S02E08: Kill Sub-Colonel Zogg S02E07: Show mercy S02E07: Use healing magic to avert death (Flynn) S02E06: Meet a starlord (not that starlord) (Ovek) S02E06: Effectively use his fly abiity (Ovek) S02E05: Charm foe into attacking an ally (Ovek) S02E04: Obtain wearable Eld ceramic platemail (Marvus) S02E03: Learn to pilot the bubble car (Ovek) S02E03: Slay an Eld with his sword (Flynn) In Progress Kill 10 opponents in one round (Ovek) Go back to space (Marvus) Get a one-shot kill (Grimbok) Craft a flesh golem (Flynn) Turn the galley into a flying party boat Explore and clear Tobart Tower Kill five opponents in one round (Marvus) Please Carnifex (Grimbok) Decapitate an opponent with the razor disc gun (Marvus) Learn a spell from every class list (Flynn) Experience 10 new scents (Marvus) Build a zip-line transportation system (Ovek) Learn to build bubble cars (Flynn) Join the wizard council and rise in influence (Flynn) Build a giant furnace to power the astroid Obtain a third tower Increase influence in the city Build a spelljammer Avoid going back to space (Grimbok) Get new Eld armor (Marvus) Learn how to reactivate the astroid (Flynn) Become an archmage (Flynn) Achieve divinity (Marvus) Be not evil (needs clarification) Teach Flynn to pilot the bubble car (Ovek) Save the party from a TPK (Marvus) Find a Folding Boat Donate to charity

item.title: S02E02: Tower Assault
item.description:
Session Date: 4/22/2017

The party has decided to ascend an Eldish tower and commandeer a bubble car parked on it’s roof. A presumably easy task, considering the single guard.

item.title: Campaign Map
item.description: Google Maps version Visited Hexes of Note 43.44 Lemetaro, villaged saved from the Emerald Enchanter. 41.44 Citadel of the Emerald Enchanter. He’s dead now. (or is he?) 39.43 Head-hunters! 36.42 The ruins of the Lapis Observatory.

item.title: Important Loot
item.description: A nautical chart showing safe routes to a small island An Eldish bubble car Four Three Six Two antiorgone grenades A very nice Wand of Cure Wounds that might be more than it seems An Eldish plasma torch, full tank Two Eldish blastotubes Eldish razordisc gun and six razordiscs Eldish pain-baton A map from the Emerald Enchanter with four areas marked

item.title: Player Characters
item.description: Flynn the Fortunate Magicky half-elf from the elf city. Mavus the Wolf Former pit-fighter, master of polearms. Ovek the Tall Jungle gnome psionicist. Grimbok the Henchman Half-beastman barbarian.

item.title: S02E01: City of the Eld
item.description:
Session Date: 3/25/2017

Fresh off their successful home invasion of the EMERALD ENCHANTER, intrepid Thulian adventurers Flynn the Fortunate, Marvus the Wolf, and Ovek the Tall, along with their loyal half-beast henchman Grimbok, head into the JUNGLE OF BURA for some routine archaeological looting. Unfortunately, the targeted structure –ruins of the elvish LAPIS OBSERVATORY– is found to be currently occupied by the ELD, and the party is sucked into an INTERDIMENSIONAL RIFT (It was Ovek’s fault.)
